title: HOEFLER/TOBIAS
content:
Back in December, i mentioned that Print had flip-flopped the "hedcuts" of Hoefler/Tobias.   
   
Nope. They were flip-flopped in my head. Here's the Time magazine online piece that I had stuck in my head...I should've read the cutline.   
   
bj ![jh.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018144841im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/4676.jpg)
author: beejay

comments.content:
OK, Brian, now we can talk to you again... ;-)   
   
hhp
Hrant, let's not be too lenient here. I mean, this flip-flopping is really out of order. Let him suffer for, let's say another month. =D
BJ! Where have you been, buddy?
thx JB, i dunno know. here, there, busy in lurk mode, sooo much activity here, can't keep up, LOFT + (
